author: Cybernews
description:
Before the Apple II, hacking was largely restricted to those with access to university or government computers. The release of the first true personal computer fundamentally changed everything, empowering a generation of software piracy, phone system control, and more. How did this early hacker scene trigger a massive government crackdown, and how did its DNA eventually led to the creation of the modern Apple App Store?

title: The Device That Changed Hacking Forever: Apple II
